mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `usercheat`( userId, username, phone, idNumber, fraudScore, fraudReasonCode )VALUES(#{userId},#{username},#{phone},#{idNumber},#{fraudScore},#{fraudReasonCode})

INSERT INTO `jointobligation`( userId, username, phone, idNumber, L7D_714_DEBT_PCNT, L7D_714_DEBT_TOTAMT, L7D_ONLINE_DEBT_PCNT, L7D_ONLINE_DEBT_TOTAMT, L7D_CUSTOMER_DEBT_PCNT, L7D_CUSTOMER_DEBT_TOTAMT, L7D_UNBANK_DEBT_PCNT, L7D_UNBANK_DEBT_TOTAMT, L30D_714_DEBT_PCNT, L30D_714_DEBT_TOTAMT, L30D_ONLINE_DEBT_PCNT, L30D_ONLINE_DEBT_TOTAMT, L30D_CUSTOMER_DEBT_PCNT, L30D_CUSTOMER_DEBT_TOTAMT, L30D_UNBANK_DEBT_PCNT, L30D_UNBANK_DEBT_TOTAMT, L3M_714_DEBT_PCNT, L3M_714_DEBT_TOTAMT, L3M_ONLINE_DEBT_PCNT, L3M_ONLINE_DEBT_TOTAMT, L3M_CUSTOMER_DEBT_PCNT, L3M_CUSTOMER_DEBT_TOTAMT, L3M_UNBANK_DEBT_PCNT, L3M_UNBANK_DEBT_TOTAMT )VALUES( #{userId}, #{username}, #{phone}, #{idNumber}, #{L7D_714_DEBT_PCNT}, #{L7D_714_DEBT_TOTAMT}, #{L7D_ONLINE_DEBT_PCNT}, #{L7D_ONLINE_DEBT_TOTAMT}, #{L7D_CUSTOMER_DEBT_PCNT}, #{L7D_CUSTOMER_DEBT_TOTAMT}, #{L7D_UNBANK_DEBT_PCNT}, #{L7D_UNBANK_DEBT_TOTAMT}, #{L30D_714_DEBT_PCNT}, #{L30D_714_DEBT_TOTAMT}, #{L30D_ONLINE_DEBT_PCNT}, #{L30D_ONLINE_DEBT_TOTAMT}, #{L30D_CUSTOMER_DEBT_PCNT}, #{L30D_CUSTOMER_DEBT_TOTAMT}, #{L30D_UNBANK_DEBT_PCNT}, #{L30D_UNBANK_DEBT_TOTAMT}, #{L3M_714_DEBT_PCNT}, #{L3M_714_DEBT_TOTAMT}, #{L3M_ONLINE_DEBT_PCNT}, #{L3M_ONLINE_DEBT_TOTAMT}, #{L3M_CUSTOMER_DEBT_PCNT}, #{L3M_CUSTOMER_DEBT_TOTAMT}, #{L3M_UNBANK_DEBT_PCNT}, #{L3M_UNBANK_DEBT_TOTAMT} )

INSERT INTO `userportrait`( username, userId, idnumber, phone, orgcombination, responselevel, risklevel )VALUES(#{username},#{userId},#{idnumber},#{phone},#{orgcombination},#{responselevel},#{risklevel})
mapper.select:
select count(*) from usercheat
username like CONCAT('%',#{username},'%')
phone like CONCAT('%',#{phone},'%')
idNumber = #{idNumber}

select count(*) from userportrait
username like CONCAT('%',#{username},'%')
phone like CONCAT('%',#{phone},'%')
idNumber = #{idNumber}

select count(*) from beoverdue
username like CONCAT('%',#{username},'%')
phone like CONCAT('%',#{phone},'%')
idNumber = #{idNumber}

select count(*) from jointobligation
username like CONCAT('%',#{username},'%')
phone like CONCAT('%',#{phone},'%')
idNumber = #{idNumber}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO configuration ( idNumber, name, phone, wifiName, wifiIP, wifiMac, phoneMarket, phoneModel, phoneRes, lac, loc, wrapName, uuid, send_time, app_name )VALUES (#{idNumber},#{name},#{phone},#{wifiName},#{wifiIP},#{wifiMac},#{phoneMarket},#{phoneModel},#{phoneRes},#{lac},#{loc},#{wrapName},#{uuid},#{send_time},#{app_name})
mapper.select: select id from configuration where phone = #{phone}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO maillist( name, phone, userId )VALUES(#{name},#{phone},#{userId})
mapper.select: select count(id) from maillist where userId = #{userId}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO userApp( userId, name, time )VALUES
(#{item.userId},#{item.name},#{item.time})
mapper.update: update configuration set phoneMarket = #{phoneMarket}, phoneModel = #{phoneModel}, phoneRes = #{phoneRes}, lac = #{lac}, loc = #{loc}, uuid = #{uuid}, wifiIP = #{wifiIP}, wifiMac = #{wifiMac}, wifiName = #{wifiName}, wrapName = #{wrapName} where phone = #{phone}
